W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: The World of the Colossal Tree

W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You descended upon the Great Treeâ€”a world teeming with life. Will you find your heart here?

W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W19_EVAR_DIVA_WORLDEXIT_000_DETAIL.text: You didn't find anything that might lead to your heart in this world. Perhaps it's time to give up and visit another.
